During a privacy law discussion with a customer, the customer indicates they need to honor requests for the right to be forgotten. The consultant determines that Consent API will solve this business need.

Which two considerations should the consultant inform the customer about? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
Based on the provided context and the user's question, here are the two considerations the consultant should inform the customer about regarding the Consent API and the right to be forgotten in Data Cloud:
1. Data deletion requests are submitted for Individual profiles.
2. Data deletion requests are reprocessed at 30, 60, and 90 days.
These considerations are crucial for ensuring compliance with privacy laws and effectively managing data deletion requests using the Consent API in Data Cloud.

https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=data.c360_a_data_deletion_request.htm&type=5

Selected Answer: AC
✅ In DC, Data Deletion requests of Individual data profiles must be submitted using the Consent API.

✅ A Data Deletion request deletes the specified Individual record from the Individual DMO and the related DMOs.

✅ Data Deletion requests are reprocessed at 30, 60, and 90 days to ensure a full deletion.

✅ Important point: Data must be related to the Individual DMO for it to be included in the deletion. Data stored in unrelated DMOs won't be deleted.

✅ In the image, for the specified Individual ID, only matching records from the DLOs 2,4,7 will be deletion via the consent APIs, not any other DLOS.

https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.c360_a_data_deletion_request.htm&type=5

Selected Answer: AB
The consultant should inform the customer about the following two considerations regarding the use of Consent API for handling right to be forgotten requests in Data Cloud:

A. Data deletion requests are submitted for Individual profiles.

The Consent API operates at the level of individual profiles in Data Cloud. When a deletion request is submitted, it targets the specific individual record and all associated data within Data Cloud.
B. Data deletion requests submitted to Data Cloud are passed to all connected Salesforce clouds.

The Consent API can be used to propagate data deletion requests across all connected Salesforce clouds, ensuring consistent data handling and compliance across the entire Salesforce ecosystem.

Selected Answer: AC
AC is it.
